quest.name: No Laughing Matter
journal:
 Quest Sync
Nonolato greets you with wild-eyed hope.
objectives: Deliver the alchemical compound to the senior researcher.

dialogue.name: NONOLATO
dialogue.text: Ahem, ho there, friend! Fancy lending a hand to a gleaner in need?

dialogue.name: NONOLATO
dialogue.text: I'm fairly new to all this gleaning business, so it's only proper that someone with the requisite, uh, experience deliver this very important Ul'dahn alchemical compound to that research facility. You know, that one a short way to the west...?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Why not ask a fellow gleaner?

dialogue.name: NONOLATO
dialogue.text: Oh, I couldn't do that! They'd never take me seriously again! No, I need someone bold and brave and unconnected to me in social circles. In other words, an itinerant adventurer! Like you!

dialogue.name: NONOLATO
dialogue.text: Wh-Why, you ask? Well, because I... I have an urgent matter to attend to elsewhere! Yes, very urgent and very far from here!

dialogue.name: NONOLATO
dialogue.text: I would do it myself, of course, but duty calls! Just deliver this package to someone in a position of seniority, and I promise I'll be back here to pay you for the favor!

dialogue.name: NONOLATO
dialogue.text: I'll be waiting right here! Er, that is, I will be after I've completed my other extremely pressing errand which prevents me from doing this one.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04185
dialogue.text: Ah yes, the Ul'dahn compound. ...Excuse me, but whatever happened to the gleaner I was told to expect? You don't quite match his description.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04185
dialogue.text: ...And so here you are, in his stead. <sigh> I thought that might be the case.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04185
dialogue.text: This facility primarily studies small vilekin and their ilk, and their role as carriers of disease. As such, we seem to have become the subject of some rather unsettling─not to mention wholly unsubstantiated─rumors.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04185
dialogue.text: I imagine some senior gleaner was amusing himself by taunting his junior colleague with scary half-truths and outright fabrications. The Scholar lend me patience, but such jests lead to no end of trouble for us.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04185
dialogue.text: In any case, I thank you for bringing me my delivery. Should you happen to return to our faint-hearted gleaner, pray do me the service of setting him straight on what it is we do here.

dialogue.name: NONOLATO
dialogue.text: You...you're back! And not suffering from any horrible maladies! Well, nothing visible, anyway.

dialogue.name: NONOLATO
dialogue.text: ...What's that? You think someone's been having a laugh at my expense?

dialogue.name: NONOLATO
dialogue.text: But...but the others told me! They said the researchers ordered a forbidden substance from Ul'dah so they could concoct some kind of zombie powder...and that gleaners who deliver there are often never seen again!

dialogue.name: NONOLATO
dialogue.text: ...Aye, that does sound a bit unlikely now that I say it out loud. Grrr, those lying bastards. Right, well, here's what I owe you─plus a little extra for keeping quiet. Gods above, I'll never live this down...
